Tell us what you like!
Using the "Rate It" button in the title details
page, please rate at least 10 movies or TV
shows you like with 4 or 5 stars.
The "Recommended For You" option will then
show you other titles you might like.
The more you rate, the better the
recommendations!

Tell us what you like!
Using the "Rate It" button in the title details
page, please rate at least 10 movies you
like with 4 or 5 stars.
The "Recommended For You" option will then
show you other titles you might like.
The more you rate, the better the
recommendations!
Press the Browse Store button, and browse for new movies or TV shows.

Strings.String: Your KNOWHOW Movies account is currently linked to an UltraViolet account allowing access to your UltraViolet Digital Collection.
Your UltraViolet account is pending. Please log into your UltraViolet account at www.uvvu.com for more information.
Your UltraViolet account has been deleted. Please log into your UltraViolet account at www.uvvu.com for more information.
Your UltraViolet account has been suspended. Please log into your UltraViolet account at www.uvvu.com for more information.
Your UltraViolet account is blocked because the first Full-Access User has not accepted the required Terms Of Use (TOU). Please log into your UltraViolet account at www.uvvu.com for more information.
Your UltraViolet account is blocked. Please log into your UltraViolet account at www.uvvu.com for more information.
Your UltraViolet account is not active. Please log into your UltraViolet account at www.uvvu.com for more information.
Your KNOWHOW Movies account is currently not linked to an UltraViolet account. Would you like to sign-in or register to an UltraViolet account?
In order to get UltraViolet access, you will need to link an UltraViolet account to your KNOWHOW Movies account by visiting www.knowhowmovies.com.

Page.name: AudioFormat
Page.TextField: AAC 2-channel stereo audio. AAC audio is supported by the majority of playback devices.
5.1 surround available on select titles. If audio is mute, set the audio format to Stereo and try again.

Page.name: UpdateList
Page.TextField: Removes all updates and restores to factory default:
You can update to a sepecific version:

Strings.String:
Welcome to KNOWHOW Movies, where you can rent or buy hit Hollywood movies and top TV shows, then watch them instantly on your Television! Choose from thousands of new release movies or catch up on episodes of your favourite TV shows without any advert breaks.
KNOWHOW Movies is powered by Rovi, the cross platform service that lets you buy once and watch anywhere. Learn more at www.knowhowmovies.rovistore.com/info.
To activate the KNOWHOW Movies service for this device, select the Settings button on the left and then select Activate Device.

Welcome to KNOWHOW Movies, where you can rent or buy hit Hollywood movies, then watch them instantly on your Television! Choose from thousands of new release movies.
KNOWHOW Movies is powered by Rovi, the cross platform service that lets you buy once and watch anywhere. Learn more at www.knowhowmovies.rovistore.com/info.
To activate the KNOWHOW Movies service for this device, select the Settings button on the left and then select Activate Device.

String.name: BothEnable
String.textformat:
1.\tSelect the Store button in the dock on the left side.
2.\tOn the Store page, choose a main browse category from the left wheel, e.g. "Movies".
3.\tChoose a filter option from the right wheel, e.g. "New Releases".
4.\tSelect a title in the grid and use the Enter remote button to view the details page.
5.\tTo purchase the title, select the Rent/Buy button.
6.\tTo find similar titles, select the Similar button.
7.\tTo learn more about the title, select the More Info button.
8.\tTo rate a title, select the Rate It button and use the Left and Right remote buttons to set your rating.
9.\tTo browse individual seasons/episodes in a TV show, select the Seasons/Episodes button.

Page.name: Searching
Page.TextField: SEARCHING THE KNOWHOW Movies STORE AND MY LIBRARY

String.name: baselineEnable
String.textformat:
1.\tSelect the Search button from the dock on the left side.
2.\tSearch for a title, actor, director, writer, or keyword by choosing an option in the search wheel.
3.\tUse the Up, Down, Left and Right remote buttons to select each character of the search phrase. Use the Enter remote button to enter each character when selected.
4.\tIf you are searching for an actor, director or writer, select their name when it appears in the list on the right side. A slide-out panel will appear with a grid of titles related to the selected name.
5.\tSearch results will appear on the right side when your search phrase matches items in the KNOWHOW Movies store or My Library.
6.\tSelect a title in the grid and use the Enter remote button to view the details page. If you already own the title, the library details page will be displayed.

String.name: baselineDisable
String.textformat:
1.\tSelect the Search button from the dock on the left side.
2.\tSearch for a title or keyword by choosing an option in the search wheel.
3.\tUse the Up, Down, Left and Right remote buttons to select each character of the search phrase. Use the Enter remote button to enter each character when selected.
4.\tSearch results will appear on the right side when your search phrase matches items in the KNOWHOW Movies store or My Library.
5.\tSelect a title in the grid and use the Enter remote button to view the details page. If you already own the title, the library details page will be displayed.

Page.name: WishList
Page.TextField: MANAGING YOUR KNOWHOW Movies WISH LIST

TextField.name: bodyText
TextField.textformat:
1.\tBrowse to a title details page and select the + Wish List button to add the title to your wish list.
2.\tSelect the Wish List button from the dock on the left side to view items in your wish list.
3.\tChoose a category from the wheel.
4.\tSelect a title in the grid and use the Enter remote button to rent or buy it, view details, or remove it from your wish list.

String.name: BothEnable
String.textformat:
1.\tSelect the My Library button in the dock on the left side to access all titles in your library.
2.\tThe My Library page will allow access to purchases made on this device, and on your other KNOWHOW Movies devices.
3.\tOn the My Library page, choose a main browse category from the left wheel, e.g. "Movies".
4.\tChoose a filter option from the right wheel, e.g. "All".
5.\tSelect a title in the grid and use the Enter remote button to view the details page.
6.\tTo play the title, select the Play or Resume Play button.
7.\tTo find similar titles, select the Similar button.
8.\tTo learn more about the title, select the More Info button.
9.\tTo rate a title, select the Rate It button and use the Left and Right remote buttons to set your rating.
10.\tTo browse individual seasons/episodes in a TV show, select the Seasons/Episodes button.

String.textformat:

4.\tChoose a filter option from the right wheel, e.g. "All".
5.\tSelect a title in the grid and use the Enter remote button to view the details page.
6.\tTo play the title, select the Play or Resume Play button.
7.\tTo rate a title, select the Rate It button and use the Left and Right remote buttons to set your rating.
8.\tTo browse individual seasons/episodes in a TV show, select the Seasons/Episodes button.

TextField.name: bodyText
TextField.textformat:
1.\tGo to www.knowhowmovies.com/parent and configure parental controls for your KNOWHOW Movies account. You can create a PIN, and choose which kinds of rated content to restrict when parental controls are enabled on a device.
2.\tTo enable parental controls on this device, select the Parental Controls button in the dock on the left side, and enable the Parental Controls checkbox.
3.\tTo automatically enable parental controls each time the application is launched, select the Parental Controls button in the dock on the left side, and enable the Automatically Enable Parental Controls on Launch checkbox.
4.\tTo require the PIN to be entered when making purchases, select the Settings button in the dock on the left side, choose Family from the left wheel, Require PIN for Purchases from the right wheel, and enable the checkbox.
5.\tEach of the parental control settings can also be changed remotely, via a web browser. Go to www.knowhowmovies.com/parent to change settings for this device.

TextField.name: bodyText
TextField.textformat:
1.\tSelect an option from the dock on the left side to access the main sections of the KNOWHOW Movies application.
2.\tSelect a wheel, and use the Up and Down remote buttons to choose an option in a wheel.
3.\tUse the Up, Down, Left and Right remote buttons to browse through a title grid.
4.\tSelect a scroll bar on the right side of a title grid, and use the Up and Down remote buttons to quickly page through the titles.
5.\tSelect a title in a grid, and use the Enter remote button to view the details page for the selected title.

Page.name: Customer
Page.TextField: If you need help viewing a video or have any other questions about KNOWHOW Movies, visit www.knowhowmovies.com/help. You can search the Knowledgebase or contact the customer support team, who are ready to help you every step of the way.

Strings.String: RENTING OR BUYING MOVIES AND TV SHOWS

String.name: giftCardsEnable
String.textformat:
1.\tOn a title details page, select the Rent/Buy button.
2.\tUsing the Up and Down remote buttons, choose a purchase option from the wheel on the slide-out panel.
3.\tIf you have a KNOWHOW Movies Gift Card or Coupon, select the Redeem Gift Card or Coupon button and enter your code. The value of your Gift Card or Coupon will be applied to your order.
4.\tSelect the Place Order button.
5.\tWhen the purchase confirmation message appears, select the Play button to start playing your video.

String.name: giftCardsDisable
String.textformat:
1.\tOn a title details page, select the Rent/Buy button.
2.\tUsing the Up and Down remote buttons, choose a purchase option from the wheel on the slide-out panel.
3.\tSelect the Place Order button.
4.\tWhen the purchase confirmation message appears, select the Play button to start playing your video.

Page.name: start
Page.TextField: KNOWHOW Movies gives you instant access to new film releases, classic movies and TV shows.

Page.name: welcome
Page.TextField:
Latest blockbuster releases available to rent or buy
No subscription - You only pay for what you watch
Simple and easy to use
You can check out our extensive range of films and TV shows, but you'll need to activate your device before you can watch them. You can do this at any time by going to

Pages.name: views
Pages.TextField: Ready to activate your device? Creating an account gives you immediate benefits:

ul.li: Instant rentals and purchases are 1-click away
Access the latest new releases every Tuesday
Securely store movies and TV shows in your KNOWHOW Movies library!
Instant rentals and purchases are 1-click away
Access the latest new releases every Tuesday
Securely store movies in your KNOWHOW Movies library!

Commands.Set: You need to activate this device to use this feature.

Commands.Set: You need to activate this device to make purchases.

Page.name: forgotPassword
Page.TextField: Enter your email address and we'll email you a link to reset your password.

The following name has been assigned to this device:

You will need to add billing info to your account before buying or renting titles. Go to {URL} to add billing info.

Page.TextField: Prefer to enter this information using your PC?

Page.TextField: To get started go to the following URL:

Page.TextField: Please enter this into the "Activation Code" field at ${URL}

Page.TextField: Please enter this into the "Activation Code" field at

Must contain at least one letter and one number.
Must contain at least one letter and one number.
Enter name as it appears on credit card.
Month must be in range 1 to 12.
Expiration date occurs in the past.

PinDialog.TextField: Don't have a PIN? Go to www.knowhowmovies.com/parent

Page.name: main
Page.TextField: Please wait a moment while we test the speed of your Internet connection.

Page.name: results
Page.TextField: The speed of your Internet connection will vary depending on the time of day and the current Internet activity in your local area.

Page.name: results_no_upgrade
Page.TextField: The speed of your Internet connection will vary depending on the time of day and the current Internet activity in your local area.

Page.name: upgrade
Page.TextField: Your Internet connection speed is currently ${Speed}Mbps.

For a good video experience, we recommend 4 Mbps.
For the best HD experience, we recommend at least 8 Mbps.
To find what broadband services are available for your home, visit
www.knowhowmovies.com/highspeed

Commands.name: show
Commands.Set: Your Internet connection speed is currently ${Speed}Mbps.

Strings.String: Your Internet connection is too slow to instantly stream videos.
Your Internet connection is fast enough to instantly stream SD video, but too slow for HD.
Your Internet connection is fast enough to instantly stream SD and HD video.

Still having trouble? Please go to
www.knowhowmovies.com/help
and type the following error code in the search box:
Credit Card Ending in [last 4 digits of cc]:

You selected a movie that comes with UltraViolot, extending the benefits and portability of movies you own through KNOWHOW Movies. Because of these additional rights, you'll need to link an UltraViolet account to your KNOWHOW Movies account to complete this purchase.
Please register for an UltraViolet account or sign in to an existing account.

Because of the added benefits and additional rights that come with UltraViolet content, you'll need to link an UltraViolet account to your KNOWHOW Movies account to complete this purchase.
Your UltraViolet account has expired. You most likely did not validate your email address with UltraViolet while your account was pending. Please visit the My Account area of KNOWHOW Movies.com to complete your account linking and then select Try Again.

Page.name: uvTOUChanged
Page.TextField: The UltraViolet Terms of Use has changed.
